LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Append_Empty_Item__c.description: Indicates whether the empty item is appended.

cgcloud__Customizable__c.description: If deselected, data type is used only on Mobility.

cgcloud__Data_Length_Decimal_Places__c.description: Represents the allowed number of decimal places

cgcloud__Data_Length__c.description: The length of data that can be entered for the data type.

cgcloud__Data_Type__c.description: Represents the length of the datatype.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the data type belongs.
